title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, November 19, 2021
description: On this date in 1863, Abraham Lincoln delivered the Gettysburg Address at the dedication of the Soldiers' National Cemetery in Gettysburg, Pennsylvania.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
